notes.text:
This update for libqt5-qtsvg fixes the following issues:

Security issues fixed:

- CVE-2018-19869: Fixed Denial of Service when parsing malformed URL reference (bsc#1118599)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: An issue was discovered in Qt before 5.11.3. A malformed SVG image causes a segmentation fault in qsvghandler.cpp.
notes.title: CVE description
